document_data.mainbody:
The Caliphs Harbor was located in Huzuz, the City of Delights, along the banks of Al-Sarif River.
This harbor housed the personal barge of the Grand Caliph as well as the admirality of Huzuz.
The Grand Caliphs barge was maintained in a state of constant readiness, since none knew when he would wish to take a sporadic trip.
Extensive repair facilities performed maintenance on at least five ships at any given time. At least a dozen launches provided access from the repair areas to the harbor.
Keyfa al-Parid was the harbor master of the Caliphs Harbor in 1367 DR.
